headline: Freeport Stock Falls After Fatal Mudslide Prompts Production Warning
summary: Shares of Freeport McMoRan declined sharply after the miner notified investors of significant production delays tied to a fatal mudslide at its operations in Indonesia.  The Phoenix-based company's stock closed 17% lower.  Freeport on Wednesday said the bodies of two of its workers were found, and five of its workers remain missing after 800,000 tons of wet material flowed into its Grasberg mine Sept. 8.

content.title: Freeport Stock Falls After Fatal Mudslide Prompts Production Warning
content.summary: Shares of Freeport McMoRan declined sharply after the miner notified investors of significant production delays tied to a fatal mudslide at its operations in Indonesia.  The Phoenix-based company's stock closed 17% lower.  Freeport on Wednesday said the bodies of two of its workers were found, and five of its workers remain missing after 800,000 tons of wet material flowed into its Grasberg mine Sept. 8.

headline: Freeport shares tumble, copper futures rise on guidance cut due to Indonesia mine accident
summary: Shares of Freeport-McMoRan tumbled Wednesday after the Phoenix-based miner said it expected a significant decline in third-quarter copper revenue due to an accident at its Indonesia mine earlier this month that will keep much of it shut down into the first half of 2026.  Freeport said in a release Wednesday that it expects consolidated sales of copper to be 4% lower than its July estimates.  Shares of Freeport fell more than 13% at midday, to $39.31 each.

content.title: Freeport shares tumble, copper futures rise on guidance cut due to Indonesia mine accident
content.summary: Shares of Freeport-McMoRan tumbled Wednesday after the Phoenix-based miner said it expected a significant decline in third-quarter copper revenue due to an accident at its Indonesia mine earlier this month that will keep much of it shut down into the first half of 2026.  Freeport said in a release Wednesday that it expects consolidated sales of copper to be 4% lower than its July estimates.  Shares of Freeport fell more than 13% at midday, to $39.31 each.

headline: Freeport-McMoRan Confronts Hard Questions After Fatal Mud Rush In Indonesia
summary: Freeport-McMoRan Inc. (NYSE:FCX) has released an update on the September 8 mud rush at its Grasberg Block Cave mine in Indonesia that killed two workers and left five still unaccounted for. The company said teams continue to work nonstop to clear debris and reach areas where the missing workers were last located. Authorities in Indonesia are overseeing the search while a formal investigation is underway. Richard C. Adkerson, chairman, and Kathleen Quirk, president and CEO, expressed condolences

content.title: Freeport-McMoRan Confronts Hard Questions After Fatal Mud Rush In Indonesia
content.summary: Freeport-McMoRan Inc. (NYSE:FCX) has released an update on the September 8 mud rush at its Grasberg Block Cave mine in Indonesia that killed two workers and left five still unaccounted for. The company said teams continue to work nonstop to clear debris and reach areas where the missing workers were last located. Authorities in Indonesia are overseeing the search while a formal investigation is underway. Richard C. Adkerson, chairman, and Kathleen Quirk, president and CEO, expressed condolences

headline: Freeport mining, Rivian probe, US new home sales surge in August
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers and stories, including mining operator Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) declaring force majeure on contracted supplies from its giant Grasberg mine in Indonesia after an accident, American regulators conducting a safety probe on Rivian (RIVN) delivery van seatbelts, and US new home sales surging by over 20% in August. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: Freeport mining, Rivian probe, US new home sales surge in August

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Freeport Declares Quarterly Cash Dividends on Common Stock
summary: PHOENIX, September 24, 2025--Freeport (NYSE: FCX) announced today that its Board of Directors declared cash dividends of $0.15 per share on FCX’s common stock payable on November 3, 2025, to shareholders of record as of October 15, 2025. The declaration includes a base dividend of $0.075 per share and variable dividend of $0.075 per share in accordance with FCX's performance-based payout framework. The payment of dividends is at the discretion of the Board, which will consider FCX's financial re

headline: FCX- Profiting from a Metal Powering the Modern World
summary: Copper is not a hype story. It doesn’t rely on moonshot projections or retail euphoria. It’s not optional for the energy transition — it’s foundational. Investors can gain exposure through multiple strategies, including large-cap producers like Freeport-McMoRan Corp. (FCX), writes Nicholas Vardy, editor of The Global Guru.

content.title: FCX- Profiting from a Metal Powering the Modern World
content.summary: Copper is not a hype story. It doesn’t rely on moonshot projections or retail euphoria. It’s not optional for the energy transition — it’s foundational. Investors can gain exposure through multiple strategies, including large-cap producers like Freeport-McMoRan Corp. (FCX), writes Nicholas Vardy, editor of The Global Guru.
